title: 111_s2071
content: CERTAIN IMAGING COLORANTS are added to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States under Subchapter II of chapter 99. Certain imaging colorants, including aryl substituted pyrazonyl and substituted naphthalene, are added to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. Certain imaging colorants, such as alkoxyphenyl azo and copper phthalocyanine, are included in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. Certain imaging colorants, including copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and sulphonoamides, sodium salts, are listed in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. Certain imaging colorants, such as copper phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and alkyl sulphonoamides, sodium salt, and lithium salt, are included in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. Phthalocyanine substituted with sulphonic acids and sulphonoamides, sodium salts (CAS No. 90295-11-7) and substituted napthtylene sodium salt (CAS No. 50925-42-3) are included in the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States. Substituted naphthalenylazo carboxyphenylene, sodium salt (PMN No. P-90-394) and chloro-substituted naphthalenyl azo sodium salt are provided for in specific subheadings with no changes before December 31, 2011. Amino triazinyl amino benzoic acid, sodium/lithium salts (PMN No. P-83-386) and aryl substituted phenylazo pyridine, sodium/lithium salt (PMN No. P-02-234) are provided for in specific subheadings with no changes before December 31, 2011. The effective date for the amendment mentioned in subsection (a) is the 15th day after the enactment of this Act, applying to articles entered or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption.
